projects.name: Student Portal
projects.description: The project was developed in two weeks using mob programming. This is a graduation project to finish the boot camp and showcase the skillset. It is a full-stack application for the student portal, to access the information and documents, and view grades. For the development, Asp.net + EntityCore was used for the back end, Auth0 for authentification, and React for the front end.

projects.name: Portfolio
projects.description: A website to show my projects. Developed using React and hosted using github pages
